analysis.description:
CrowdsaleWPTByRounds.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x38a0d00ddb1269795c0055691d8b88eb4dfa80dd.sol#413-435) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-minterContract.mint(_beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x38a0d00ddb1269795c0055691d8b88eb4dfa80dd.sol#428-431)

CrowdsaleWPTByRounds.hasClosed (/unique_contracts/0x38a0d00ddb1269795c0055691d8b88eb4dfa80dd.sol#379-384) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > closingTime (/unique_contracts/0x38a0d00ddb1269795c0055691d8b88eb4dfa80dd.sol#383)

CrowdsaleWPTByRounds.hasOpened (/unique_contracts/0x38a0d00ddb1269795c0055691d8b88eb4dfa80dd.sol#389-396) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (openingTime < block.timestamp && block.timestamp < closingTime) (/unique_contracts/0x38a0d00ddb1269795c0055691d8b88eb4dfa80dd.sol#395-396)
Ownable.renounceOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x38a0d00ddb1269795c0055691d8b88eb4dfa80dd.sol#142-143) should be declared external
